page.title: 13A BAKERY IN CROSSGATES
page.content: { Slacks Bakery}has well served the community since 1968 when it was {established by Charles Henry Slack. Charles Henry Slack is the great-grandfather of the present managing director.{Slacks have four {shops,}one in Garforth, one in the Killingbeck area, and two in Crossgates. In Garforth is the {production bakery}and there they bake up to a thousand loaves every day not including bread rolls and confectionery. The bakery employs 23 staff to fulfill the production. Apart from bread Slacks sell{dairy goods, {cooked meats and cheeses.}They specialize in{fresh cream pastries and {wedding cakes.}Their products can vary according to the season, for example {strawberry tarts in Summer, Christmas {cakes in Winter.}It is a very successful business.
